redeem_page.not_send_on_time: The Vault did not send BTC to you on time. To redeem your PolkaBTC, you must now pick one of the two options:
redeem_page.retry_again_and_get_compes: A. Retry: Try again and get a {{amountDOT}} DOT compensation.
redeem_page.you_will_receive_dot: You can retry to redeem your BTC with another vault by opening a new redeem request. You will receive {{amountDOT}} DOT as compensation for the inconvenience.
redeem_page.reimburse_total: B. Reimburse: You will get a total of {{total}} DOT.
redeem_page.exchange_rate: for you {{amountPolkaBTC}} PolkaBTC given the current exchange rate of {{rate}} BTC/DOT.
redeem_page.please_note: You will not receive any BTC if you remburse.
